q1: Does Ronaldo deserve to be the captain of Portugal?
a1: Ronaldo is the captain of Portugal
a2: Maybe it was Luis Figo? But i'm not sure.
q3: Will Portugal win a World Cup?
a3: If they don't win a World Cup with Ronaldo, I don't think they will win one for the foreseeable future.
q4: Do they have any young players upcoming?
a4: Bruma is one to watch for Portugal.
q5: I think that the ronaldo deserves to be the captain because he is the best in the world
a5: ronaldo is the best player in the history of Portugal
